item.description:
** Thanks to all for attending the introductory potluck last night.  We agreed to start on Chapter One this Th at 6:30-8:45pm at the Coolidge Corner branch of the Brookline Public Library.  We will welcome new members to the 12 week cycle through September (Chapters 1 + 2) and after that date, the meetup cycle will be closed to new membership.

 

What we accomplished:  Meet and greet/overview of our individual areas of creativity and growth goals; discussion of the BAsic Tools (Morning Pages, Artist Dates, Walking, Commitment to self to complete the 12 week work).  We agreed to meet weekly until Dec 15, skipping Thanksgiving Day.

We will aim for a goal of a group size of 10-12 maximum.

NEXT:

If you are planning to work through the Artist's Way with us, please RSVP and we will begin our journey next week!

 

PARKING: ****Parking is available at the Brookline Public Parking lots on Babcock and John Streets.
item.name: Chapter One
